bill_title: to authorize the Board of  Regents to erect an unheated storage building on the campus of Black Hills State University.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize the Board of Regents to erect a cold storage building on the campus of Black Hills State University and to provide for its funding. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Board of Regents may construct a cold storage building at Black Hills State University, Spearfish, at an estimated cost of seventy-six thousand one hundred sixty nine dollars ($76,169), which sum may be expended from higher education facility funds allocated to the institution for purposes of maintenance and repair. Section 2. The Board of Regents may accept, transfer, and expend any funds obtained for these purposes from federal sources, gifts, contributions, or any other source. Section 3. The design and construction of these modifications is under the general charge and supervision of the Bureau of Administration as provided in chapter 5-14. Section 4. The executive director of the Board of Regents and the commissioner of the Bureau of Administration shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize the Board of Regents to erect an unheated storage building on the campus of Black Hills State University and to provide for its funding. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Board of Regents may construct an unheated storage building at Black Hills State University, Spearfish. BILL HISTORY January 14 - First read in Senate and referred to Appropriations. S.J. 21 January 24 - Scheduled for hearing. February 3 - Scheduled for hearing. February 3 - Amended title. February 3 - Passed as amended, AYES 9, NAYS 0. S.J. 275
